story_text: Blue Sue was on a quest to find the true hue of the sky.
She knew a clue was hidden in the dew on the grass under the morning sun.
story_images: A girl named Sue wearing a blue dress, looking up at the sky with a thoughtful expression.
A close-up view of dew drops on green grass with the morning sun shining in the background.

questions.question: What color dress is Sue wearing?
Where did Sue think the clue was hidden?
choices: In the dew on the grass
questions.answer: In the dew on the grass
